resource.chars:
I will come over.
So much of what Captain 
Scott says is in the same form as 
that already used elsewhere by Mr 
Bernacchi <s>and some of it is <\s> that 
I gather that some of the criticism 
is stimulated by Mr Bernacchi 
especially as Captain Scott continues 
a casual discussion begun at Dublin 
at which Mr Bernacchi was 
present <s>but <\s> and at which a 
perfectly unimportant remark of mine 
in the form of a question,
that I have not seen reported,
becomes perverted into a deliberate 
reflexion upon the <s>capacity <\s> conduct & capacity of the expedition.
